Career Profile

A polyglot Senior Software Engineer with over 15 years experience, working for diverse markets as Automotive, Online Gambling and Health Care.

Currently working for BMW as a Team and Technical Lead, helping the team to design, implement, test and deploy solutions for autonomous driving car projects. Always focus on using the best practices in the market and a DevOps mindset, as Agile Methodologies, Continuous Integration and Deployment, Test Driven Design and Infrastructure as Code.

Deep and broad understanding in designing and developing robust, scalable and high-performance microservices using core Java, Spring Boot and AWS.

I am proactive, highly motivated and interested in personal and professional development through continuous learning as well as coaching other engineers and building a strong team culture.

Senior Software Enginner

August 2018 - Present | Porto, PT
BMW & Critcal Tech Work, Automotive Industry

  • Team Lead and part of the autonomous driving car project.

  • Responsible to design solutions and implement them, together with the team, using Java, Spring Framework and cloud technologies.

  • Focus on agility and increased business value, with a strong emphasis in test automation. Responsible to automate end-to-end business processes and software processes, applying Continuous Integration and Delivery, Infrastructure as Code, automating whetever possible to speedup the time to market while avoiding errors.

  • Modeling and best practices for a high available architecture in the cloud, using Multi Availability Zones and Multi Regions setup, with a active-active failover based on health metrics.

  • Technically coaching teams on Core Java, cloud technologies infrastructure automation to adopt a cloud native architecture, using Terraform and Packer in a CICD pipeline for a fully automated deployment.

  • Coaching junior members from internal teams, helping them on adopting core tecnologies at BMW.
